attributes.action: Reduce the age that the full NMW is paid from 22 to 18
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: You can vote at 18, you can legally drink alcohol at 18, you can gamble at 18. But you cannot get a full wage until you are 22. This is outrageous and needs to be changed. Some statistics from a survey carried by the Union of Shop, Allied and Distribution Workers (USDAW) revealed: Only 16 percent can afford to live indepently. 25 percent found it difficult to afford enough food. 41 percent were combining work with higher education, but of these, 40 percent found it difficult or very difficult to keep up with stdies because of the hours of work
